articles.author: Olivier Laurent, Ruby Mellen
articles.title: Cyclone leaves Indian Ocean island in ruins, photos show - The Washington Post
articles.description: After the devastating winds and torrential rainfall subsided, foreign journalists were able to travel to the remote French department, and document the devastation.
articles.content: Cyclone Chido ripped through the Indian Ocean archipelago of Mayotte this weekend, flattening entire neighborhoods, with hundreds feared dead. After the devastating winds and torrential rainfall subs… [+352 chars]
